alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 7:31PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT LUCAS...MONROE...SOUTHEASTERN DECATUR...SOUTHERN WAPELLO...DAVIS...WAYNE AND APPANOOSE COUNTIES... At 729 PM CDT, the leading edge of an area of moderate to locally heavy snow showers was located along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Lake Sundown to 11 miles northwest of Unionville. Movement was east southeast at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Centerville, Chariton, Albia, Bloomfield, Corydon, Lake Sundown, Rathbun Lake, Eldon, Seymour, Moravia, Moulton, Russell, Allerton, Humeston, Mystic, Cincinnati, Blakesburg, Pulaski, Lineville and Drakesville. Although little accumulation is expected on roads, visibilities may quickly drop to a half mile or less in the heavier snow showers. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this area of heavy snow. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations.

area.areaDesc: Appanoose; Davis; Decatur; Lucas; Monroe; Wapello; Wayne
